1185.Question: What are the 5 biggest cities by population in the state of California ?
1185.Query: SELECT DISTINCT ?city ?pop WHERE{ ?type rdfs:subClassOf+ yago:wordnet_city_108524735 . ?city a ?type . ?city yago:isLocatedIn+ yago:California . ?city yago:hasPopulation ?pop . } ORDER BY DESC(xsd:integer(?pop)) LIMIT 5

1156.Question: How many cities in the UK have a population of less than 5 million?
1156.Query: SELECT (COUNT(?city) AS ?numCities) WHERE { ?city a ?type . ?type rdfs:subClassOf+ yago:wordnet_city_108524735. ?city yago:isLocatedIn+ yago:United_Kingdom.?city yago:hasPopulation ?population. FILTER(xsd:integer(?population) < 5000000) }

424.Question: Is Kent west of Norfolk?
424.Query: ASK { <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Kent> geo:hasGeometry ?g1. <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Norfolk> geo:hasGeometry ?g2. ?g1 geo:asWKT ?w1. ?g2 geo:asWKT ?w2. FILTER(strdf:left(?w1, ?w2)) }

838.Question: What is the total number of baronies which have nature reserves?
838.Query: select (COUNT (DISTINCT ?x) as ?baronies) where { ?x rdf:type <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OSI_Barony>; geo:hasGeometry ?cGeom1. ?cGeom1 geo:asWKT ?cWKT1. ?y rdf:type <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OSM_nature_reserve>; geo:hasGeometry ?cGeom2. ?cGeom2 geo:asWKT ?cWKT2. FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?cWKT2,?cWKT1)) }

657.Question: Which Civil Parishes or Communites intersect Metropolitan District Wards in Birmingham?
657.Query: SELECT DISTINCT ?canal WHERE {<http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Birmingham> <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#hasGeometry> ?geomLC. ?geomLC geo:asWKT ?cWKT. ?canal rdf:type y2geoo:OS_CivilParishorCommunity . ?canal <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#hasGeometry> ?geoPrk. ?geoPrk geo:asWKT ?canalWKT. ?town rdf:type y2geoo:OS_MetropolitanDistrictWard . ?town <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#hasGeometry> ?geomL. ?geomL geo:asWKT ?townWKT. FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?townWKT, ?cWKT) && strdf:intersects(?townWKT, ?canalWKT)) }

60.Question: Which are the main railway stations in Glasgow?
60.Query: SELECT DISTINCT ?rs WHERE{ ?rs a osm:Railway_Station ; geo:hasGeometry ?rsGeom . ?rsGeom geo:asWKT ?rsWKT . ?x owl:sameAs <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Glasgow>; geo:hasGeometry ?instanceGeom . ?instanceGeom geo:asWKT ?instanceWKT. FILTER geof:sfContains(?instanceWKT, ?rsWKT) }

535.Question: Which counties are near Nottingham?
535.Query: SELECT distinct ?shire WHERE { yago:Nottinghamshire geo:hasGeometry ?g1. ?g1 geo:asWKT ?wkt1. ?shire a y2geoo:OS_County. ?shire geo:hasGeometry ?g2. ?g2 geo:asWKT ?wkt2. FILTER( ?shire != yago:Nottinghamshire && (geof:distance(?wkt1, ?wkt2, uom:metre) < 5000 )) }

181.Question: Which county of England occupies the largest area?
181.Query: select ?x ?property where { ?x rdf:type <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/wordnet_county_108546183>. ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/isLocatedIn> <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/England>. ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/areatotalkm> ?property. } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

918.Question: How many canals in England are west of villages in Camrbridgeshire?
918.Query: select (COUNT (DISTINCT ?x) as ?canals) where{ yago:Cambridge geo:hasGeometry ?oGeo . ?oGeo geo:asWKT ?oWKT . yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?eGeo . ?eGeo geo:asWKT ?eWKT . ?x rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_canal. ?x geo:hasGeometry ?xgeo. ?xgeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT. ?y rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_village. ?y geo:hasGeometry ?ygeo. ?ygeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT. FILTER (geof:sfContains(?eWKT, ?xWKT) && geof:sfContains(?oWKT, ?yWKT) && strdf:left(strdf:transform(?xWKT, <http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/4326>), strdf:transform(?yWKT, <http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/4326>))) }

851.Question: How many bays are adjacent to villages?
851.Query: SELECT (COUNT (DISTINCT ?x1) as ?bays) WHERE { ?x1 rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_bay. ?x1 <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#hasGeometry> ?x1Geo. ?x1Geo geo:asWKT ?x1WKT. ?x2 rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_village. ?x2 <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#hasGeometry> ?x2Geo. ?x2Geo geo:asWKT ?x2WKT. FILTER(geof:sfTouches(?x1WKT, ?x2WKT)). }

1001.Question: Which of the municipalities that border Thessaloniki has the biggest area?
1001.Query: SELECT ?neighboring (strdf:area(?yWKT)as ?totalArea) WHERE { yago:geoentity_Dimos_Thessaloniki_8133841 geo:hasGeometry ?xGeom . ?xGeom geo:asWKT ?xWKT . ?neighboring a y2geoo:GAG_Municipality . ?neighboring geo:hasGeometry ?yGeom . ?yGeom geo:asWKT ?yWKT . FILTER(geof:sfTouches(strdf:buffer(?xWKT,0,uom:metre), strdf:buffer(?yWKT ,0,uom:metre))) } ORDER BY DESC(?totalArea) LIMIT 1

1000.Question: Which are the smallest 5 lakes north of Dublin?
1000.Query: select distinct ?y ((strdf:area(?yWKT))as ?totalArea) where{ ?y a y2geoo:OSM_lake. ?y geo:hasGeometry ?ygeo. ?ygeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT. <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/resource/gadmentity_Dublin_IRL.6_1> geo:hasGeometry ?xgeo. ?xgeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT. FILTER (strdf:above(strdf:transform(?yWKT, <http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/4326>), strdf:transform(?xWKT, <http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/4326>))) }ORDER BY ASC(?totalArea) LIMIT 5

463.Question: Is Norwich at least 200 kilometers away from Greece?
463.Query: ASK { yago:geoentity_Norwich_District_7290598 geo:hasGeometry ?norwichGeometry . ?norwichGeometry geo:asWKT ?wktNorwich . yago:Greece geo:hasGeometry ?londonGeometry . ?londonGeometry geo:asWKT ?wktLondon . FILTER(geof:distance(?wktNorwich, ?wktLondon, uom:metre) >= 100000) }

139.Question: Which are the districts of county Chesire?

775.Question: Is there a lake that intersects with all the regional units of Epirus?
775.Query: ASK { { SELECT ?lake WHERE { ?lake a y2geoo:OSM_lake . ?lake geo:hasGeometry ?lakeGeo . ?lakeGeo geo:asWKT ?lakeWKT . ?region a y2geoo:GAG_RegionalUnit . ?region geo:hasGeometry ?regionGeo . ?regionGeo geo:asWKT ?regionWKT . y2geor:gadmentity_Epirus_GRC.5.1_1 geo:hasGeometry ?eGeo . ?eGeo geo:asWKT ?eWKT . FILTER (strdf:contains(?eWKT, ?regionWKT) && strdf:intersects(?lakeWKT, ?regionWKT)) } GROUP BY (?lake) HAVING (COUNT(?region) = 4) } }

74.Question: Does county Suffolk border county Durham?
74.Query: ASK { <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/County_Durham> geo:hasGeometry ?xGeom. ?xGeom geo:asWKT ?xWKT. <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Suffolk> geo:hasGeometry ?mGeom. ?mGeom geo:asWKT ?mWKT. FILTER(geof:sfTouches(?xWKT,?mWKT)) }

1128.Question: Which country's capital city is larger, Ireland's or Scotland's?
1128.Query: SELECT ?capital WHERE { { yago:Scotland yago:hasCapital ?capital } UNION { yago:Republic_of_Ireland yago:hasCapital ?capital } . ?capital geo:hasGeometry ?cGeo . ?cGeo geo:asWKT ?cWKT . BIND (strdf:area(?cWKT) as ?area) } ORDER BY DESC(?area) LIMIT 1

1025.Question: Which municipality of Greece has the smallest number of inhabitants?
1025.Query: SELECT DISTINCT ?mun WHERE { ?mun rdf:type y2geoo:GAG_Municipality . ?mun y2geoo:hasGAG_Population ?population } ORDER BY ASC (?population) LIMIT 1

875.Question: How many nature reserves are in rural areas?
875.Query: SELECT (COUNT (DISTINCT ?nature_reserve) as ?reserves) WHERE { ?nature_reserve a y2geoo:OSM_nature_reserve. ?nature_reserve geo:hasGeometry ?x1Geo. ?x1Geo geo:asWKT ?x1WKT. ?rural_area a y2geoo:OSI_Rural_Area. ?rural_area geo:hasGeometry ?x2Geo. ?x2Geo geo:asWKT ?x2WKT. FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?x1WKT, ?x2WKT))}

634.Question: Identify any nature reserves that are situated south of a forested area.
634.Query: SELECT DISTINCT ?nature_reserve WHERE { ?nature_reserve rdf:type <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OSM_nature_reserve> . ?nature_reserve geo:hasGeometry ?nature_reserve_geo . ?nature_reserve_geo geo:asWKT ?nature_reserve_geoWKT . ?forest rdf:type <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OSM_forest> . ?forest geo:hasGeometry ?forest_geo . ?forest_geo geo:asWKT ?forest_geoWKT . FILTER(strdf:below(?nature_reserve_geoWKT, ?forest_geoWKT) ) }

32.Question: Is there a National Park in England?
32.Query: select distinct ?np where { ?np rdf:type <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/wordnet_park_108615149>. ?np <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/type> ?o. ?np <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/isLocatedIn>+ ?o1. FILTER (CONTAINS(str(?o),"National park") OR CONTAINS(str(?o),"nationalpark") OR CONTAINS(str(?o),"national park") and CONTAINS(str(?o1),"England") ) }

988.Question: Which rural area south of Longford has the smallest forest?
988.Query: select distinct ?rural_areas (strdf:area(?geoWKT) as ?totalArea) where { <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/County_Longford> geo:hasGeometry ?Suffolk_geo . ?Suffolk_geo geo:asWKT ?Suffolk_geoWKT . ?rural_areas rdf:type <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OSI_Rural_Area> . ?rural_areas geo:hasGeometry ?rural_areas_geo . ?rural_areas_geo geo:asWKT ?rural_areas_geoWKT . FILTER(strdf:below(?rural_areas_geoWKT,?Suffolk_geoWKT)) . ?forest rdf:type <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OSM_forest> . ?forest geo:hasGeometry ?o2 . ?o2 geo:asWKT ?geoWKT2 . FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?geoWKT2, ?rural_areas_geoWKT)) } ORDER BY ASC(?totalArea) LIMIT 1

376.Question: Is Essex north of Kent?
376.Query: ASK { yago:Essex geo:hasGeometry ?g. ?g geo:asWKT ?geoWKT. yago:Kent geo:hasGeometry ?g2. ?g2 geo:asWKT ?geoWKT2. FILTER(strdf:above(?geoWKT,?geoWKT2)) }

754.Question: Is there a village south of a forest in Wicklow?
754.Query: ASK { ?x1 a y2geoo:OSM_village. ?x1 geo:hasGeometry ?x1Geo. ?x1Geo geo:asWKT ?x1WKT. ?x2 a y2geoo:OSM_forest. ?x2 geo:hasGeometry ?x2Geo. ?x2Geo geo:asWKT ?x2WKT. <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/County_Wicklow> geo:hasGeometry ?x3Geo. ?x3Geo geo:asWKT ?x3WKT. FILTER (geof:sfWithin(?x1WKT, ?x3WKT)). FILTER (strdf:below(?x1WKT, ?x2WKT)) }

742.Question: Which counties of England border Wales?
742.Query: SELECT ?county WHERE { ?county a y2geoo:OS_County . ?county geo:hasGeometry ?cGeom . ?cGeom geo:asWKT ?cWKT . yago:Wales geo:hasGeometry ?wGeom . ?wGeom geo:asWKT ?wWKT . yago:England geo:hasGeometry ?eGeom . ?eGeom geo:asWKT ?eWKT . FILTER(geof:sfContains(?eWKT, ?cWKT)) . FILTER(geof:sfTouches(?cWKT, ?wWKT)). }

762.Question: Which villages are south of beaches in Peloponnese?
762.Query: SELECT DISTINCT ?village WHERE { <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Peloponnese_(region)> geo:hasGeometry ?o . ?o geo:asWKT ?geoWKT . ?village rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_village; geo:hasGeometry ?o1 . ?o1 geo:asWKT ?geoWKT1 . ?beach rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_beach; geo:hasGeometry ?o2 . ?o2 geo:asWKT ?geoWKT2 . FILTER (strdf:within(?geoWKT1, ?geoWKT) && strdf:within(?geoWKT2, ?geoWKT) && strdf:below(?geoWKT1, ?geoWKT2) ) }

461.Question: Are Dublin and Arklow more than 10km apart?
461.Query: ASK { yago:Dublin geo:hasGeometry ?DublnGeo. ?DublnGeo geo:asWKT ?DublnPolygon. yago:Arklow geo:hasGeometry ?Geo. ?Geo geo:asWKT ?Polygon. FILTER((geof:distance(?DublnPolygon, ?Polygon, <http://www.opengis.net/def/uom/OGC/1.0/metre>)) > 10000) }

1026.Question: Which 2 counties are the smallest by area?
1026.Query: SELECT DISTINCT ?county ((strdf:area(?cWKT)) as ?totalArea) WHERE { { ?county rdf:type y2geoo:OS_County } UNION { ?county rdf:type y2geoo:OSI_County_Council }. ?county geo:hasGeometry ?geoC . ?geoC geo:asWKT ?cWKT } ORDER BY (?totalArea) LIMIT 2

600.Question: Which rural areas border with Clonakilty?
600.Query: select distinct ?rural_area where { <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Clonakilty> <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#hasGeometry> ?geomLC. ?geomLC geo:asWKT ?lcWKT. ?rural_area rdf:type <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OSI_Rural_Area>; <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#hasGeometry> ?geomC. ?geomC geo:asWKT ?cWKT. FILTER(geof:sfTouches(?lcWKT, ?cWKT)) }

1143.Question: Is there a hospital in Galway?
1143.Query: ASK { ?type rdfs:subClassOf+ yago:wordnet_hospital_103540595 . ?hospital a ?type . ?hospital yago:isLocatedIn+ yago:Galway. }

76.Question: Which parks are near Trafalgar Square?
76.Query: SELECT ?x1 WHERE { ?x1 a osm:Park. ?x1 geo:hasGeometry ?x1Geo. ?x1Geo geo:asWKT ?x1WKT. ?x2 osm:has_name "Trafalgar Square"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string>. ?x2 geo:hasGeometry ?x2Geo. ?x2Geo geo:asWKT ?x2WKT. FILTER(geof:distance(?x1WKT, ?x2WKT, uom:metre) <= 500)). }

243.Question: What is the total area of Liverpool?
243.Query: select distinct (strdf:area(?geoWKT)as ?totalArea) where { yago:Liverpool geo:hasGeometry ?o. ?o geo:asWKT ?geoWKT. }

1075.Question: Which county in England has the largest number of lakes?
1075.Query: select distinct ?county where { ?county rdf:type y2geoo:OS_County . ?county geo:hasGeometry ?geomLC. ?geomLC geo:asWKT ?lcnWKT. ?lake rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_lake. ?lake geo:hasGeometry ?geomL. ?geomL geo:asWKT ?lWKT. FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?lWKT, ?lcnWKT)) }GROUP BY (?county) ORDER BY DESC(count (?lWKT)) LIMIT 1

344.Question: Is Kythira within Attica?
344.Query: ASK { yago:geoentity_Kythira_8133702 geo:hasGeometry ?o. ?o geo:asWKT ?WKT. <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Attica_(region)> geo:hasGeometry ?o1. ?o1 geo:asWKT ?WKT1. FILTER(geof:sfWithin(strdf:buffer(?WKT, 0, uom:metre), strdf:buffer(?WKT1, 0, uom:metre))) }

720.Question: Which lakes are north of a canal in London?
720.Query: SELECT DISTINCT ?a WHERE { ?a a y2geoo:OSM_lake . ?a geo:hasGeometry ?o1 . ?o1 geo:asWKT ?g1 . ?b a y2geoo:OSM_canal . ?b geo:hasGeometry ?o2 . ?o2 geo:asWKT ?g2 . yago:Greater_London geo:hasGeometry ?o3 . ?o3 geo:asWKT ?g3 . FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?g1, ?g3)) FILTER(strdf:crosses(?g2 , ?g3)) FILTER(strdf:above(?g2,?g1)) }

1197.Question: Which state capital in the USA has the largest population?
1197.Query: SELECT ?x WHERE { ?state a yago:wikicategory_States_of_the_United_States. ?state yago:hasCapital ?x. ?x yago:hasPopulation ?y } ORDER BY DESC(xsd:integer(?y)) LIMIT 1

196.Question: What London underground stations are closest to the British Museum?
196.Query: SELECT ?poi ?wkt WHERE { ?poi rdf:type osm:Railway_Station. ?poi geo:hasGeometry ?geom . ?geom geo:asWKT ?wkt . ?instance rdf:type osm:Museum . ?instance osm:has_name "British Museum"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string> . ?instance geo:hasGeometry ?inGeom . ?inGeom geo:asWKT ?inWKT . FILTER (geof:distance(?wkt, ?inWKT, <http://www.opengis.net/def/uom/OGC/1.0/metre>) < 500 ) . }

966.Question: Which is the largest forest by area in England?
966.Query: SELECT DISTINCT ?forest ((strdf:area(?fWKT)) AS ?totalArea) WHERE { ?forest rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_forest; <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#hasGeometry> ?fGeom. ?fGeom geo:asWKT ?fWKT. <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/England> <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#hasGeometry> ?lcGeom. ?lcGeom geo:asWKT ?lcWKT. FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?fWKT, ?lcWKT)) } ORDER BY DESC(?totalArea) LIMIT 1

785.Question: Which Greek regions have no lakes?
785.Query: SELECT DISTINCT ?region WHERE {?region a y2geoo:GAG_Region . ?region geo:hasGeometry ?regionGeom . ?regionGeom geo:asWKT ?regionWKT . FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?lake a y2geoo:OSM_lake . ?lake geo:hasGeometry ?lGeom . ?lGeom geo:asWKT ?lWKT . FILTER (strdf:contains(?regionWKT, ?lWKT)) } }

852.Question: How many streams intersect with lakes?
852.Query: SELECT (COUNT (DISTINCT ?p1) as ?streams) WHERE { ?p1 rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_stream; geo:hasGeometry ?p1geo. ?p1geo geo:asWKT ?p1WKT. ?p2 rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_lake; geo:hasGeometry ?p2geo. ?p2geo geo:asWKT ?p2WKT. FILTER(geof:sfIntersects(?p1WKT, ?p2WKT)) }

144.Question: Is there a forest near Manchester?
144.Query: ASK { ?forest rdf:type <http://www.app-lab.eu/osm/ontology#forest> ; geo:hasGeometry ?forestGeom . ?forestGeom geo:asWKT ?forestWKT . ?Manchester owl:sameAs <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Manchester> ; geo:hasGeometry ?ManchesterGeom . ?Manchestereom geo:asWKT ?ManchesterWKT . FILTER (geof:distance(?forestWKT, ?ManchesterWKT, uom:metre) < 5000) }

917.Question: How many canals intersect with lakes in the United States?
917.Query: select (COUNT (DISTINCT ?x) as ?streams) where{ <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/United_States> geo:hasGeometry ?oGeo . ?oGeo geo:asWKT ?oWKT . ?x rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_canal. ?x geo:hasGeometry ?xgeo. ?xgeo geo:asWKT ?xWKT. ?y rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_lake. ?y geo:hasGeometry ?ygeo. ?ygeo geo:asWKT ?yWKT. FILTER (geof:sfContains(?oWKT, ?yWKT) && strdf:intersects(strdf:transform(?xWKT, <http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/4326>), strdf:transform(?yWKT, <http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/4326>))) }

802.Question: Which Greek regional units have less than 10000 inhabitants?
802.Query: SELECT ?region WHERE { ?region a y2geoo:GAG_RegionalUnit . ?region y2geoo:hasGAG_Population ?pop. FILTER(?pop < 10000). }

915.Question: How many lakes intersect forests?
915.Query: SELECT (COUNT (DISTINCT ?lake) as ?lakes) WHERE { ?lake rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_lake. ?lake geo:hasGeometry ?g. ?g geo:asWKT ?geoWKT. ?f rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_forest. ?f geo:hasGeometry ?g2. ?g2 geo:asWKT ?geoWKT2. FILTER(strdf:intersects(?geoWKT, ?geoWKT2)) }

474.Question: Is Limerick closer to Waterford than Dublin?

FILTER (geof:distance(?twkt, ?awkt, uom:metre) < geof:distance(?iwkt, ?awkt, uom:metre)) }

995.Question: Which is the most populated region of Greece?

1040.Question: Which region that borders the Peloponnese has the smallest area?
1040.Query: SELECT ?rg { { SELECT ?rg (strdf:area(?rgWKT) AS ?area) WHERE { <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Peloponnese_(region)> geo:hasGeometry ?tgeo . ?tgeo geo:asWKT ?tWKT . ?rg rdf:type y2geoo:GAG_Region ; geo:hasGeometry ?rggeo . ?rggeo geo:asWKT ?rgWKT . FILTER(geof:sfTouches(?rgWKT,?tWKT)) . } ORDER BY ASC(?area) LIMIT 1 } }

558.Question: Which metropolitan districts are adjacent to Liverpool?
558.Query: select distinct ?metrdist where { <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Liverpool> <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#hasGeometry> ?geomLC. ?geomLC geo:asWKT ?lcWKT. ?metrdist rdf:type <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OS_MetropolitanDistrict>; <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#hasGeometry> ?geomC. ?geomC geo:asWKT ?cWKT. FILTER(geof:sfTouches(?lcWKT, ?cWKT)) }

952.Question: How much of Greece is covered by lakes?
952.Query: SELECT ((( ?lake_area_sum / ?greece_area ) * 100 ) AS ?percentage) WHERE { { SELECT (SUM(?lake_area) as ?lake_area_sum) ?greece_area WHERE { { SELECT (strdf:area(?lake_wkt) AS ?lake_area) (strdf:area(?greece_wkt) as ?greece_area) WHERE { ?lake rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_lake ; geo:hasGeometry ?lake_geom . ?lake_geom geo:asWKT ?lake_wkt . yago:Greece geo:hasGeometry ?greece_geom . ?greece_geom geo:asWKT ?greece_wkt . FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?lake_wkt,?greece_wkt)) . } } } GROUP BY ?greece_area} }

735.Question: Which municipalities in Greece have a lake inside their boundaries?
735.Query: SELECT DISTINCT ?dhmoi WHERE{ <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Greece> geo:hasGeometry ?o. ?o geo:asWKT ?geoWKT. ?lake <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OSM_lake>. ?lake geo:hasGeometry ?o1. ?o1 geo:asWKT ?geoWKT1. ?dhmoi <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/GAG_Municipality>. ?dhmoi geo:hasGeometry ?o2. ?o2 geo:asWKT ?geoWKT2. 132.Question: Which restaurants are near Baker Street in London?

FILTER (geof:sfWithin(?p1aswkt,?lWKT) && geof:distance(?p1aswkt, ?p2aswkt, uom:metre) < 500) }

173.Question: Which is the largest city of Ireland?
173.Query: select distinct ?x ?property where { ?x rdf:type <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/wordnet_city_108524735>. ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/isLocatedIn> <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Ireland>. ?x <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/infobox/en/areatotalkm> ?property } ORDER BY DESC(?property) LIMIT 1

939.Question: What is the number of people that live in the Municipalities of Central Greece?
939.Query: select (SUM(distinct ?pop) AS ?people) where { ?x rdf:type y2geoo:GAG_Municipality. ?x geo:hasGeometry ?xGeom. ?x y2geoo:hasGAG_Population ?pop. ?xGeom geo:asWKT ?xWKT. <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Central_Greece_(region)> geo:hasGeometry ?o1 . ?o1 geo:asWKT ?iWKT . FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?xWKT, ?iWKT)) }

605.Question: Which municipalities are contained in the South Athens Regional Unit?
605.Query: SELECT distinct ?y WHERE { <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/geoentity_PerifereiakΓ­_EnΓ³tita_NotΓ­ou_TomΓ©a_AthinΓ³n_8200483> geo:hasGeometry ?gx . ?gx geo:asWKT ?xWKT . ?y a y2geoo:GAG_Municipality . ?y geo:hasGeometry ?gy . ?gy geo:asWKT ?yWKT . FILTER(strdf:contains( ?xWKT,?yWKT )) }

938.Question: How many baronies have parks inside them?
938.Query: select (COUNT (DISTINCT ?counties) as ?countiesss) WHERE{ ?counties <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OSI_Barony>. ?counties geo:hasGeometry ?o. ?o geo:asWKT ?geoWKT. ?park <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OSM_park>. ?park geo:hasGeometry ?o1. ?o1 geo:asWKT ?geoWKT1. FILTER(geof:sfWithin(?geoWKT1,?geoWKT)) }

431.Question: What is the distance between Glasgow and Edinburgh?
431.Query: SELECT (strdf:distance(?gwkt, ?ewkt, uom:metre) as ?distance) WHERE { yago:geoentity_Glasgow_City_3333231 geo:hasGeometry ?ggeom . ?ggeom geo:asWKT ?gwkt . yago:Edinburgh geo:hasGeometry ?egeom . ?egeom geo:asWKT ?ewkt . }

962.Question: Which county in the British Isles is the smallest by area ?
962.Query: SELECT DISTINCT ?county ((strdf:area(?cWKT)) as ?totalArea) WHERE { { ?county rdf:type y2geoo:OS_County } UNION { ?county rdf:type y2geoo:OSI_County_Council } UNION { ?county rdf:type y2geoo:OSI_City_and_County_Council. } . ?county geo:hasGeometry ?geoC . ?geoC geo:asWKT ?cWKT } ORDER BY (?totalArea) LIMIT 1

91.Question: Where is a car park near Big Ben?
91.Query: SELECT distinct ?w2 WHERE { ?poi osm:has_name "Big Ben"^^xsd:string. ?poi geo:hasGeometry ?geo . ?geo geo:asWKT ?w . ?div rdf:type osm:Parking. ?div geo:hasGeometry ?geo2 . ?geo2 geo:asWKT ?w2 . filter(geof:distance(?w,?w2, uom:metre) < 100) }

697.Question: Which forests contain streams in the State of Iowa?
697.Query: SELECT DISTINCT ?forest WHERE { yago:Iowa geo:hasGeometry ?o . ?o geo:asWKT ?geoWKT . ?forest rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_forest; geo:hasGeometry ?o1 . ?o1 geo:asWKT ?geoWKT1 . ?stream rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_stream; geo:hasGeometry ?o2 . ?o2 geo:asWKT ?geoWKT2 . FILTER (strdf:within(?geoWKT1, ?geoWKT) && strdf:within(?geoWKT2, ?geoWKT) && geof:sfContains(?geoWKT1, ?geoWKT2) ) }

868.Question: What is the number of municipalities that contain one or more canals?

615.Question: Which is the largest park by area in the municipality of Athens?

932.Question: How many streams interect beaches and lakes?
